column1: Little Goat Diner////We were a party of two
column2: but even then we were quoted a 45 minute wait (a group of four that went in after us said they were told to expect an hour-and-fifteen-minute wait!) on a Saturday around noon. It was just starting to get slightly chilly last weekend
column4: so we decided we were dressed warmly enough to take a seat outside instead of waiting. In retrospect
column5: I'm really happy we ate outside. It was beautiful outside
column6: and quiet compared to inside. The restaurant itself was SO LOUD (yes
column7: I'm shouting!) and packed (tables very close to each other)
column8: inside that I doubt we'd be able to hear each other very well
column9: let alone have the great conversations we had outside.
